Way of the Open Hand

Flurry of Blows: Topple: Punch twice in quick succession and potentially knock the targetProne. Flurry of Blows: Stagger: Punch twice in quick succession and Stagger the target, making it unable to take Reactions. Flurry of Blows: Push: Punch twice in quick succession and potentially push your target 5m/17 ft away.

Shadow Arts: Hide: Hide from enemies by succeeding at Stealth checks. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy
